title: How to use Rift Herald like an OPL pro

replies.body: How to use Rift Herald like an OPL pro? Easy. Forget it takes the place of your trinket ward and summon it in the middle of your jungle when you're trying to get vision.

They are very {{champion:91}} ted

Leaving a Comment... pewpew
Soo... We're not supposed to leave the eye on the ground and walk around pretending it's not there? Cos that's all I've been seeing lately. PogChamp
I'm not sure what i expected, but i'm sure it wasn't this
